attributes.action: Ask all politicians and executives to go unpaid for 2 months
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: As bank executives have caused people to lose their jobs and houses the only decent option they have is for all politicians and bank executives go unpaid for 2 months and that money be shared out to all uk citizens as a goodwill gesture.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
